name: Hobbit Room VR
description:
With inspiration taken from Bilbo Baggins’ study, featured in ‘The Lord of the Rings’ and ‘The Hobbit,’ this Hobbit Room was built within Maya over the course of semester 1, 2018. All objects within the room where created by myself, with some images sourced from online and materials manipulated through Photoshop. For an extracurricular activity, I then took this room and turned in into a VR experience using Unity, allowing people to see the room as if they are actually there.

Please note that this is an experience and not interactable in its current stage.

*I do not take credit for sketches used in the room. These were created by various artists found online. Except the hobbit on the desk. That one's mine.

*This project was made for educational purposes only. It will not be used for commercial purposes in any way.
